entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
